title: looking for b1/s3 duo to climb
body: hello beautiful people looking for a support/adc main to climb with. I play every role and sitting at 64%wr and want to keep it above 60 to get to plat this season hit me up if you are looking to climb!!

replies.body: Yea, Im looking for a duo add me. I only play on weekends though.
few things, what rank are you, and secretly u know posting this on boards is illegal xD im gold, and are u looking for smurf? or just a duo mate
Lock him up and throw away the key.
